attributes.action: BAN animals from being bought or sold on websites, including Ebay and Gumtree
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The RSPCA has recently rescued a starved Weimaraner that was tied up with electrical wire in a back garden. Apparently, it had been bought off an online buy and sell website. 

The dog had been hardly fed, had worms and had lost most of its body fat before being rescued. 

There needs to be MORE REGULATION, especially in relation to owning a dog.

Please sign this petition to STOP the sale of animals on buy and sell and auction style internet sites. 

Animals can easily be bought from registered breeders or from the many recognised organisations, including the RSPCA, PDSA, The Dogs Trust, Battersea Dogs Home and registered breeders where animals can bought or taken to be re-homed and where prospective owners can at least be "vetted" for their suitability as owners.
